definition: to show every possible consideration (idiom); meticulous care
body/form/style/system/substance/to experience/aspect (linguistics)
to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]
surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
tiny/miniature/slightly/profound/abtruse/to decline/one millionth part of/micro-/Taiwan pr. [wei2]

sentences.english: Yes , yes, " said the Acting Dean gently."
sentences.chinese: “不錯，不錯，”代理院長體貼入微地說。

sentences.english: He is always considerate to old people.
sentences.chinese: 他對老人一向體貼入微。

sentences.english: He was carefully nursed by his wife .
sentences.chinese: 他的妻子體貼入微地照顧他。

sentences.english: Activities washing can lead to design considerate, flexible and practical.
sentences.chinese: 可活動洗滌龍頭，設計體貼入微，靈活實用。

sentences.english: He recovered soon under his wife's tender loving care.
sentences.chinese: 在妻子體貼入微的關懷下，他很快就痊癒了。

sentences.english: John showed great consideration for Janet.
sentences.chinese: 約翰對珍妮特體貼入微。

sentences.english: That nurse cared for the patient as tenderly as she did her own daughter .
sentences.chinese: 那位護士像照顧自己的女兒一樣體貼入微地照顧患者。

sentences.english: Note person than before, Yang Lun's comments even more attentive.
sentences.chinese: 較之前人之注，楊倫的註解更加體貼入微。

definition: the utmost care (idiom); to look after sb in every possible way
selfless/impartial
lit. if thrown on the floor, it will make a sound (idiom)/fig. (of one's words) powerful and resonating/to have substance

to make an effort to become strong (idiom); determined to do better/to pull one's socks up
industrious and conscientious/assiduous
diligent and thrifty (idiom)
night and day (idiom); continuous strenuous effort
lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
impoverished/backward both economically and culturally

(of friends or partners) to share both the honor and the disgrace (idiom)

to travel around the country
fair and reasonable (idiom); sensible/standing to reason
